external_references.description: Secureworks. (2019, July 24). Resurgent Iron Liberty Targeting Energy Sector. Retrieved August 12, 2020.

description: [Dragonfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0035) has obtained and used tools such as [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002), [CrackMapExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0488), and [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029).(Citation: Secureworks IRON LIBERTY July 2019)
